name: BillingArrangement
comment: Contains the details of billing documents, which is a periodic invoice or bill sent to the customer.
vf short description: Contains the details of billing documents, which is a periodic invoice or bill sent to the customer.

fields.name: BillingArrangementSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: BillingArrangementKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the billing arrangement in ALDM. Each billing arrangement key value represents a unique billing arrangement . Generated Key based on Billing Arrangement Id

fields.name: FinancialAccountSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BillingArrangementStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: BillingArrangementConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: BillingArrangementStatusDate
fields.comment: Logical date on which the current billing arrangement status was changed. BillingAccount.stateDate

fields.name: BillingArrangementConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the converged status changed.

fields.name: BillProductionFrequencyCode
fields.comment: Indicates the frequency of billing production. The values are: 1-52 for Weekly 1-12 for Monthly BillingAccount.billStructure.billFrequency

fields.name: OpenDate
fields.comment: Date on which a billing arrangement was opened. The date mask is YYYYMMDDHH24MISS. For example:19600101000000 - HISTORICAL-DATETIME 47001231000000 - FUTURE-DATETIME BillingAccount.openDate

fields.name: BillingArrangementId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the billing arrangement in the source system. BillingAccount.id

fields.name: BillFormatInd
fields.comment: Specifies the bill format, that is the presentation type for the bill.Values are:- Printed- Email BillingAccount.billStructure.format.name

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExternalId
fields.comment: An external identifier of the account. This attribute is used if the billing arrangement is also present in the external systems.

fields.name: BssCreationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was created in the source system BillingAccount.controlFields.createdOn

fields.name: BssModificationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was modified in the source system BillingAccount.controlFields.lastModifiedOn

fields.name: ModificationEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BillingArrangementSourceId
fields.comment: Internal object id of the billing arrangement.

fields.name: BillingArrangementDueDayNumber
fields.comment: Defines the number of days to be added to the invoice date to calculate the due date. BillingAccount.billStructure.dueDays

fields.name: BillingArrangementDocumentTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates whether the billing document is an invoice or a bill. BillingAccount.billStructure.documentType

fields.name: LastBillCycleInstanceSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: DocumentProductionInd
fields.comment: Indicates whether a document should be produced for the billing arrangement. Values are: Yes (Y) - Produce and extract.No (N) - Do not produce or extract.Extract (E) - Extract for archive only. Do not produce a bill to the customer. BillingAccount.billStructure.produceBillInd

fields.name: ZeroBalanceFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the balance of the billing arrangement at the billing run, should be made zero. For example, in the case of internal employees.Values are:1 - Y 0 - N BillingAccount.billStructure.zeroBalanceInd

fields.name: MainAddressSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: MainContactSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BillingArrangementName
fields.comment: The name of the billing arrangement. BillingAccount.name

fields.name: BillingArrangementDesc
fields.comment: The description of the billing arrangement. BillingAccount.description

fields.name: BillingArrangementType
fields.comment: A categorization of an account, such as individual, joint, and so on, whose instances share some of the same characteristics. BillingAccount.type

fields.name: AccountType
fields.comment: Indicates account type. BillingAccount.accountType

fields.name: AccountSubType
fields.comment: Indicates account sub type. BillingAccount.accountSubType

fields.name: BillingArrangementStatusReason
fields.comment: The reason for the corresponding status, which is taken from the last activity that changed the status. BillingAccount.stateReason

fields.name: BillingArrangementStatusIssueDate
fields.comment: The date on which the status was changed. BillingAccount.stateIssueDate

fields.name: BillingArrangementStatusLastActivity
fields.comment: The last activity that caused the status modification. BillingAccount.statusLastActivity

fields.name: LatePaymentFeeWaiverFlag
fields.comment: Defines if a late payment fees should be calculated for this account or if the account is waived from late payment fees. BillingAccount.waiveLatePaymentFee

fields.name: CreditLimitUomInd
fields.comment: The unit for the credit limit. BillingAccount.creditLimit.unit

fields.name: CreditLimitValue
fields.comment: The credit limit value. BillingAccount.creditLimit.value

fields.name: ChargeTaxFlag
fields.comment: It indicates whether the tax is calculated for each charge or for the total amount of the bill. BillingAccount.billStructure.billItemTaxInd

fields.name: RatingTypeInd
fields.comment: Rating Type associated with Billing Arrangement. One of two possible value postpaid or prepaid must be filled. BillingAccount.ratingType

fields.name: CurrencySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: DefaultPaymentMethodSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BillingCycleSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
